greetings.text: Greetings, this is {Agent Name} from Study Centre. How are you today?
Hello! I'm {Agent Name} from Study Centre. I wanted to talk to you about something exciting. Do you have a moment?
Good {Morning/Afternoon}, this is {Agent Name} from Study Centre. How are you?
Myself, {Agent Name} calling from Study Centre. Do you have some moments?
This is {Agent Name} callig from Study Centre. Are you free right now?
